RIPE Policy Proposal 2018-06 Analyser
=====================================

A simple tool to show what RIPE-NONAUTH objects are affected by
RIPE Policy Proposal 2018-06.

Installation
------------

`pip3 install ripe-proposal-2018-06`

Use
---

`$ ripe-proposal-2018-06`
